title: Tekashi 6ix9ine Snitches On Rapper Jim Jones, Internet Explodes With Hilarious Reactions
text:
Tekashi 6ix9ine just shocked the courtroom where he is testifying against fellow gang members by snitching to the judge rapper Jim Jones is part of the Nine Trey set and the internet is going insane.

According to his testimony, federal prosecutors questioned him on the rapper “Who is Jim Jones?” 6ix9ine answered “He's a retired rapper.” Then, they were specific about Jones' gang activity, “Is he a member of Nine Trey Bloods Gang?”

Tekashi answered,“Yes.”

View photos

Jones and 6ix9ine were seen together in the past, and had been photographed at several events. But, when the word leaked that Tekashi would be snitching on his fellow gang members, Jim was pissed and commented on the situation.

The Harlem rapper called him a "rat" and "unmentionable."

"Screw him," Jim said in an interviews. "He did some actions that he can't come back from, so his name non-mentionable. If you a rat, then you're a rat forever. That's a subject we don't even have to touch on."

The internet then exploded with memes and reactions to the Jim Jones testimony, and it is classic.

50 Cent Trolls, Like Only Fofty Can

Stephen A. Smith As Jim Jones

Choking On The Words

Full 'New Jack City' Style

SNITCH!!!!!!!!

What Did He Just Say??!!

Tekashi is still testifying, and it seems this isn't the last time he will shock the courtroom on his snitch bus...which is slowing rolling forward.
description: You Have To See Top Reactions, They're Priceless
